table.name: vtiger_internaltickets
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_internaltickets` ( `internalticketsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ticket_description` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `employee_email` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `documents` VARCHAR(256) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`internalticketsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_internalticketscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_internalticketscf` ( `internalticketsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`internalticketsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
